lead_paragraph: BLUM--Abbey. Five years have gone, five years have passed; Our memories of you have proven to last. Without you our lives have never been the same; You gave us much more than simply a name. Lessons, guidance, and critiques were quite frequent; Taken in stride without certainty of what you meant. What you mean to us is more than words can show; Your spirit continues, even if you left a while ago. Love Ward, Tripp, Maritza, and Ross 1/3
